name: part_008
file: tmp_【3D LIVE】秘密結社holoX3周年 3DLIVE【#SSholoX3周年】 [ztW56LCevmI]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_008.mov

scenes.description: Sakamata Chloe and Kazama Iroha performing the song 'Happy Synthesizer'.
An illustration-based interlude where La+ Darknesss joins Kazama Iroha.
La+ Darknesss and Kazama Iroha performing the song 'Catch the Moment' on stage.

subtitles.original: ...つまらない
subtitles.english: ...boring

subtitles.original: タテマエや　ヤなこと全部
subtitles.english: facades and all the bad things

subtitles.original: 消してあげるから　この音で
subtitles.english: I'll wipe them away with this sound

subtitles.original: なんのとりえもない　僕に唯一
subtitles.english: There's only one thing I, who has no merit,

subtitles.original: 少しだけ出来ること
subtitles.english: am able to do a little bit of

subtitles.original: 心踊らせる　飾らない言葉
subtitles.english: The unadorned words that make my heart dance,

subtitles.original: 電子音で伝えるよ
subtitles.english: I'll convey them with electronic sounds

subtitles.original: 好きになること理屈なんかじゃなくて
subtitles.english: Falling in love isn't about logic,

subtitles.original: こじつけなんかいらないんじゃない？
subtitles.english: don't you think we don't need any excuses?

subtitles.original: 時代のせいと諦めたらそこまで
subtitles.english: If you give up and blame the times, that's the end of it,

subtitles.original: 踏み出さなくちゃ何も始まらない
subtitles.english: nothing will start unless you take a step forward

subtitles.original: ごめんね夜分遅く　眠るところだったでしょう？
subtitles.english: Sorry for the late hour, you were probably about to sleep, right?

subtitles.original: 驚いた私も　駆け出そうとしていた
subtitles.english: I, who was surprised, was also about to start running out

subtitles.original: 心の裏側を　くすぐられているような
subtitles.english: Like having the back of my heart tickled,

subtitles.original: 惹かれあう二人に　幸せな音を
subtitles.english: giving a happy sound to the two of us who are drawn to each other

subtitles.original: ハッピーシンセサイザ　ほらね　楽しくなるよ
subtitles.english: Happy Synthesizer, see, it's getting fun

subtitles.original: 涙拭うメロディ　奏でるよ
subtitles.english: I'll play a melody that wipes away tears

subtitles.original: 強がらなくたっていいんじゃない？別に
subtitles.english: It's okay not to act tough, isn't it? Really,

subtitles.original: 自分に素直になればいい
subtitles.english: you should just be honest with yourself

subtitles.original: なんのとりえもない　僕に唯一
subtitles.english: There's only one thing I, who has no merit,

subtitles.original: 少しだけ出来ること
subtitles.english: am able to do a little bit of

subtitles.original: ちょっと照れるような　単純な気持ち
subtitles.english: The simple feelings that are a bit embarrassing,

subtitles.original: 電子音で伝えるよ
subtitles.english: I'll convey them with electronic sounds

subtitles.original: ハッピーシンセサイザ　君の　胸の奥まで
subtitles.english: Happy Synthesizer, into the depths of your heart,

subtitles.original: 届くようなメロディ　奏でるよ
subtitles.english: I'll play a melody that reaches you

subtitles.original: つまらないタテマエや　ヤなこと全部
subtitles.english: The boring facades and all the bad things,

subtitles.original: 消してあげるから　この音で
subtitles.english: I'll wipe them away with this sound

subtitles.english: There's only one thing I, who has no merit,

subtitles.english: am able to do a little bit of

subtitles.english: The unadorned words that make my heart dance,

subtitles.english: I'll convey them with electronic sounds

subtitles.english: Happy Synthesizer, see, it's getting fun

subtitles.original: 涙拭うメロディ　奏でるよ
subtitles.english: I'll play a melody that wipes away tears

subtitles.original: 強がらなくたっていいんじゃない？別に
subtitles.english: It's okay not to act tough, isn't it? Really,

subtitles.original: 自分に素直になればいい
subtitles.english: you should just be honest with yourself

subtitles.original: なんのとりえもない　僕に唯一
subtitles.english: There's only one thing I, who has no merit,

subtitles.original: 少しだけ出来ること
subtitles.english: am able to do a little bit of

subtitles.original: ちょっと照れるような　単純な気持ち
subtitles.english: The simple feelings that are a bit embarrassing,

subtitles.original: 電子音で伝えるよ
subtitles.english: I'll convey them with electronic sounds

subtitles.original: いろはーーーっ！スイッチ！
subtitles.english: Iroha! Switch!

subtitles.original: え、ラプラス殿！？
subtitles.english: Eh, La+ dono!?

subtitles.original: 助けに来たぞ！助太刀ってやつだ！
subtitles.english: I've come to help! I'm your backup!

subtitles.original: 助かるでござる！
subtitles.english: That helps a lot!

subtitles.original: でも、よく場所がわかったでござるな？
subtitles.english: But how did you know where I was?

subtitles.original: ふん！吾輩は総帥だぞ！
subtitles.english: Hmph! I am the leader, after all!

subtitles.original: そんなことより、ほら行くぞいろは！
subtitles.english: Never mind that, come on, let's go Iroha!

subtitles.original: おう！でござるっ！
subtitles.english: Right! Gozaru!

subtitles.original: Catch the Moment
subtitles.english: Catch the Moment

subtitles.original: そっと吐き出す溜息を吸い込んで
subtitles.english: Sucking in the sigh gently exhaled

subtitles.original: 後悔は苦い味残して
subtitles.english: regret leaves behind a bitter taste

subtitles.original: いつも何で肝心なこと言えないまま
subtitles.english: Why is it always that while I'm unable to say the important things,

subtitles.original: 次の朝日が顔出して
subtitles.english: the next morning sun shows its face

subtitles.original: 嫌になった運命をナイフで切り刻んで
subtitles.english: Carving up the destiny I've grown to hate with a knife,

subtitles.original: もう一度
subtitles.english: one more time

subtitles.original: やり直したら君に出会えないかも
subtitles.english: If I start over, I might not be able to meet you

subtitles.original: 僕の声が
subtitles.english: When my voice

subtitles.original: 響いた時に始まる
subtitles.english: resounds, it begins

subtitles.original: イレイサブル・リミット　心臓がカウントしてる
subtitles.english: Erasable limit, my heart is counting down

subtitles.original: 叶えても
subtitles.english: Even if it comes true,

subtitles.original: 叶えても
subtitles.english: even if it comes true,

subtitles.original: 終わらない願い
subtitles.english: a wish that never ends

subtitles.original: 汗をかいて走った世界の秒針は
subtitles.english: The world's second hand, which I ran sweating alongside,

subtitles.original: いつか止まった僕を置いていく
subtitles.english: will one day leave me behind when I've stopped

subtitles.original: あと何回君と笑えるの
subtitles.english: How many more times can I laugh with you?
